title: NHL®13
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, German, Czech, Finnish, Russian, Swedish.  Featuring the biggest innovation for the franchise in six years, NHL® 13 will deliver a revamped gameplay experience that accurately captures the speed, creativity and strategy of today’s NHL headlined by all-new True Performance Skating, and supported by EA SPORTS™ Hockey I.Q. NHL 13 will also deliver new experiences that connect hockey fans to their friends and the real world of hockey with the all-new GM Connected and NHL Moments Live game modes. With core gameplay innovation, connected experiences, and the deepest feature set ever in an EA SPORTS NHL title, NHL 13 is truly the definitive hockey experience.

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL™ 13: Cover Announce
childDownloads.description: In this trailer, EA SPORTS congratulates Claude Giroux for winning the the first-ever cover vote campaign for NHL13.  The vote came down to the last day but Giroux beat Rinne narrowly in the last hours on the vote. Congratulations Giroux!

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL™ 13 Demo Trailer
childDownloads.description: This trailer highlights all the new features of NHL™ 13 which include True Performance Skating, EA SPORTS Hockey I.Q., GM Connected, and an entire presentation overhaul. True Performance Skating authentically replicates the explosiveness, momentum, and top-end speed of today’s NHL players. EA SPORTS Hockey IQ also delivers the deepest and most customizable set of real-world hockey systems and strategies ever. All-New GM Connected — The franchise’s most popular mode connects you and friends with the real world of hockey, allowing you to manage, play, or coach in a 30-team, human-controlled league. In terms of aesthetics, NHL13 is amazing entailing all-new shadows where stadium lights are modeled after their real-world counterparts. With all these new features, NHL13 has given us a level of authenticity never seen before in a hockey game making NHL13 the definitive hockey experience.

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL™ 13: Game-play
childDownloads.description: In this trailer, game-play is shown demonstrating real in-game footage of NHL13. The trailer shows the revolutionary True Performance Skating in action showing how it replicates actual hockey.

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL™ 13 Presentation Overhaul
childDownloads.description: This trailer shows the complete overhaul of the aesthetics of NHL13.  This entails all new shadows where stadium lights are modeled after their real-world counterparts.  Revamped character models and shading give the players a level of authenticity never seen before in the NHL franchise.  In addition to True Performance Skating,  dynamic skate spray has been added to the skating engine in which snow spray sticks to the boards and character models.	Furthermore, new gameplay cameras such as the true broadcast camera have been included to replicate real world broadcast cameras.  New commentary has been added that has improved replay analysis where the commentators pick the correct highlights and players are highlighted in real-time.  With a complete presentation overhaul, NHL13 authentically replicates everything that is hockey, making NHL13 the definitive hockey experience.

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL13: GM Connected
childDownloads.description: All-New GM Connected—The franchise’s most popular mode connects you and friends with the real world of hockey, allowing you to manage, play, or coach in a 30-team, human-controlled league. You can also take your GM Connected experience with you using the mobile companion app, ensuring that you’ll never miss a single moment.

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL13: Defensive Game-play
childDownloads.description: In this trailer, game-play is shown to demonstrate how True Performance Skating and the revamped A.I. can help you defend in NHL13.  EA SPORTS I.Q. enables you to set forecheck systems and defensvie strategies just like in the NHL.

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL13: EVERY STRIDE MATTERS
childDownloads.description: This trailer features True Performance Skating and EA SPORTS Hockey I.Q. Driven by real-world physics and more than 1,000 new gameplay animations, True Performance Skating authentically replicates the explosiveness, momentum, and top-end speed of today’s NHL players. With a new layer of creativity added in-game, combined with control offered by the Skill Stick, you now have the entire toolset of an NHL player at your fingertips. With a completely overhauled A.I. system players are now fully aware of others on the ice, resulting in quicker, smarter, and more true-to-life decision-making. EA SPORTS Hockey IQ also delivers the deepest and most customizable set of real-world hockey systems and strategies ever.  With both True Performance Skating, and Hockey I.Q., NHL13 is the definitive hockey experience.

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL13: Hockey I.Q.
childDownloads.description: This trailer highlights all the new features of NHL™ 13 which include  EA SPORTS Hockey I.Q.—With a completely overhauled A.I. system players are now fully aware of others on the ice, resulting in quicker, smarter, and more true-to-life decision-making. EA SPORTS Hockey IQ also delivers the deepest and most customizable set of real-world hockey systems and strategies ever.

childDownloads.title: EA SPORTS NHL13: Last Man Standing
childDownloads.description: This trailer features the all-new Anticipation A.I, and Complete Limb Movement that have been integrated into goalies in NHL13.  With Anticipation A.I., goalies are now prepared for all threats on the ice, not just the puck carrier, allowing goalies to make incredible cross-crease desperation saves.  Furthermore, Complete Limb Movement gives goalies the full skill-set of an NHL Goalie by allowing each limb to move dynamically in accordance to the puck.  Goalies now have the ability to have the perfect game just like in the NHL.  With the all-new Anticipation A.I. and Complete Limb Movement, NHL13 gives you the most authentic goalies ever made making NHL13 the definitive hockey experience.

Featuring the biggest innovation for the franchise in six years, NHL® 13 will deliver a revamped gameplay experience that accurately captures the speed, creativity and strategy of today’s NHL headlined by all-new True Performance Skating, and supported by EA SPORTS™ Hockey I.Q.
